sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Configuración de Virtual Servers Citrix ">3105d62cdb7573002ca60d53ca961963</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:2e8027044f173300c09fb8de9310c75f</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>deshabilitarcuandoQuedeseasHacerValue</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		return;
	}
	var tipo = g_form.getValue('que_deseas_hacer');
	if(tipo == 'Eliminar Servidores' || tipo == 'Deshabilitar Servidores' || tipo == 'Habilitar Servidores'){
		console.log("deshabilitarcuandoQuedeseasHacerValue");
		
	}else{
		g_form.setValue('n_mero_de_servers_a_enlazar', 1);
		g_form.setMandatory('servidor_a_eliminar_1',false);
		g_form.setMandatory('servidor_a_eliminar_2',false);
		g_form.setMandatory('servidor_a_eliminar_3',false);
		g_form.setMandatory('servidor_a_eliminar_4',false);
		
		g_form.setDisplay('servidor_a_eliminar_1',false);
		g_form.setDisplay('servidor_a_eliminar_2',false);
		g_form.setDisplay('servidor_a_eliminar_3',false);
		g_form.setDisplay('servidor_a_eliminar_4',false);
		
		
		g_form.setDisplay('n_mero_de_servers_a_enlazar',true);
		g_form.setMandatory('nombre_servidor_1', true);
		g_form.setMandatory('nombre_servidor_2', false);
		g_form.setMandatory('nombre_servidor_3', false);
		g_form.setMandatory('nombre_servidor_4', false);
		g_form.setMandatory('nombre_servidor_5', false);
		g_form.setMandatory('nombre_servidor_6', false);
		g_form.setMandatory('nombre_servidor_7', false);
		g_form.setMandatory('nombre_servidor_8', false);
		
		
		g_form.setMandatory('ip_servidor_1', true);
		g_form.setMandatory('ip_servidor_2', false);
		g_form.setMandatory('ip_servidor_3', false);
		g_form.setMandatory('ip_servidor_4', false);
		g_form.setMandatory('ip_servidor_5', false);
		g_form.setMandatory('ip_servidor_6', false);
		g_form.setMandatory('ip_servidor_7', false);
		g_form.setMandatory('ip_servidor_8', false);
		
		//Visible
		g_form.setDisplay('nombre_servidor_1', true);
		g_form.setDisplay('nombre_servidor_2', false);
		g_form.setDisplay('nombre_servidor_3', false);
		g_form.setDisplay('nombre_servidor_4', false);
		g_form.setDisplay('nombre_servidor_5', false);
		g_form.setDisplay('nombre_servidor_6', false);
		g_form.setDisplay('nombre_servidor_7', false);
		g_form.setDisplay('nombre_servidor_8', false);
		
		g_form.setDisplay('ip_servidor_1', true);
		g_form.setDisplay('ip_servidor_2', false);
		g_form.setDisplay('ip_servidor_3', false);
		g_form.setDisplay('ip_servidor_4', false);
		g_form.setDisplay('ip_servidor_5', false);
		g_form.setDisplay('ip_servidor_6', false);
		g_form.setDisplay('ip_servidor_7', false);
		g_form.setDisplay('ip_servidor_8', false);
	}
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-08-14 17:20:01</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>88dfca054fdfb300c09fb8de9310c7b4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>20</sys_mod_count><sys_name>deshabilitarcuandoQuedeseasHacerValue</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="BCR_APP" source="x_287988_bcr_app">28f3b438db33230087d9d6aa48961993</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="BCR_APP">28f3b438db33230087d9d6aa48961993</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_88dfca054fdfb300c09fb8de9310c7b4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-02-20 17:58:08</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
